backend/main.mo: Marketplace canister defining product, user, cart, and order types plus access-controlled profile and product queries with category initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a navigation Buy entry to Header.tsx with related components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend project files including components, pages, config, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style variables defining light/dark themes with custom OKLCH color tokens and global resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading main React bundle with Strager branding, icons, and manifest.
frontend/public/.well-known/assetlinks.j: Template Digital Asset Links file requiring package name and certificate fingerprint substitution.
frontend/public/.well-known/assetlinks.R: Instructions for configuring Android Digital Asset Links for TWA including SHA-256 and package name setup.
frontend/public/downloads/README.txt: Guide for hosting APK and AAB files, naming conventions, download URLs, and version management.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining Strager app metadata, icons, theme colors, categories, and screenshots.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with simple styling and retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker that caches core assets, cleans old caches, and serves requests with network-first logic and offline fallbacks.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the app layout and configures all React Router routes for pages like products, cart, checkout, and account.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Protects routes by requiring authentication and shows a sign‑in prompt when the user is not logged in.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the app footer with copyright text and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main site header with logo, search bar, navigation, cart count, and authentication-aware actions.
frontend/src/components/LocationStrip.ts: Shows the user’s saved delivery location and opens a dialog to update it.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles sign‑in and sign‑out using Internet Identity and updates cached queries accordingly.
frontend/src/components/MobileHeaderAcco: Mobile header button linking to orders when authenticated or home otherwise.
frontend/src/components/ProductForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing products with fields for name, description, price, stock, category, and image selection.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to submit display name, optional email, and seller status, saving the profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/PromoCard.tsx: UI card component displaying a promo image with overlayed badge, title, and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/PromoCarousel.ts: Renders promo cards in a mobile horizontal scroll or desktop grid using static promo data.
frontend/src/components/QuickBenefitsRow: Displays a horizontal list of four marketplace benefits with icons and labels.
frontend/src/components/SettingsMenu.tsx: Side sheet menu showing installation links (conditional) plus legal and support links based on user auth/profile state.
frontend/src/components/UpdateLocationDi: Dialog allowing users to update and save their location to localStorage via an input field.
frontend/src/content/brandCopy.ts: Exports centralized brand text constants such as app name and search placeholders.
frontend/src/hooks/useAabDownloadValidat: Validates AAB download URLs on change and exposes validation state and results.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useApkDownloadValidat: Validates APK download URLs on change and tracks loading and error status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status management.
Hook for reading and writing a string value to localStorage with state syncing.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, products, categories, cart actions, and order data using an actor backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollToAnchorOnRo: Scrolls smoothly to a section based on the 'scrollTo' query parameter when the route changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, color variables, dark mode values, and common utility classes for layout and styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AabDownloadPage.tsx: Page for generating, validating, and copying Android AAB download links with filename handling and notices.
frontend/src/pages/AccountOrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's order history with status badges, loading skeletons, and AuthGuard protection.
frontend/src/pages/ApkDownloadPage.tsx: Page for generating, validating, and copying Android APK download links with security warnings and filename handling.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows and updates the user's cart with product details, quantity adjustments, and empty/loading states under AuthGuard.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Displays checkout form, validates shipping info, calculates subtotal, and submits order before redirecting to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows homepage with location strip, promo carousel, categories, and featured products loaded from queries.
frontend/src/pages/InstallAppPage.tsx: Provides step‑by‑step instructions for installing the PWA on mobile devices and links to the packaging guide.
frontend/src/pages/MobileAppPackagingGui: Guides users through PWA install, Android APK/AAB packaging, and iOS wrapper setup with copyable URLs.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Fetches and displays order confirmation details and shipping info after purchase, with links to view the order or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Loads and displays detailed order information including items, status, and product data, with navigation back to order history.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the privacy policy page with sections describing data collection and usage. Uses cards and icons to present structured policy content.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a single product, including images, pricing, stock, and add‑to‑cart functionality. Handles loading, errors, and authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Shows all active products with search, category, and price filters. Fetches products and categories and renders filterable product listings.
frontend/src/pages/SellerDashboardPage.t: Provides sellers with tools to manage their products, including creating, editing, and deactivating listings. Fetches the seller's products and wraps actions with dialogs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/SupportContactPage.ts: Displays support and contact information including email, address, and FAQ-style sections. Uses cards and accordions to organize help content.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: React page rendering the Terms of Service with styled sections and icons using Cards and Tailwind classes.
frontend/src/utils/aabValidation.ts: Provides a function to validate whether a URL points to an accessible AAB file using HEAD/GET requests and content-type checks.
frontend/src/utils/apkValidation.ts: Implements URL validation for APK files via HEAD/GET requests and MIME-type inspection to confirm file authenticity.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Utility for copying text to the clipboard with safe failure handling.
frontend/src/utils/siteOrigin.ts: Returns the site origin at runtime, returning null during SSR.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, shadows, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, goals, architectural notes, issues, and implemented feature metadata for the marketplace app.
